title: Corrupting Cinderella
description: I'm not Cinderella. But he's my Prince Charming.Our story isn't a fairy tale...How can a lawyer and a criminal maintain an enduring romantic relationship?Although attorney Hope Kendall cares deeply for President of the Lost Kings MC, Rochlan "Rock" North, the truth is they come from completely different worlds. Add to that the fact that they are also both headstrong people, and they have a very rough road ahead of them.For Rock that means introducing Hope to what it really means to be part of his brutal and shady world, where the Lost Kings Motorcycle Club is his main focus. For Hope it means accepting the things she canâ€™t change, and understanding that Rock is a man who will do anything to keep her safe.As Rock continues to draw Hope deeper into his world, painful misunderstandings, past relationships, and opposition from the members of his club will threaten to drive them apart.
author: Autumn Jones Lake
